full_text.19: The National Safety Council says 72% of preventable opioid deaths occur to individuals between the ages of 25-54. @HealthyFla's work on substance use prevention, treatment and recovery gives hope to those who are affected or struggling with substance use. https://t.co/mCuF0Mm6vo
